alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 31 at 5:52PM MDT until March 31 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph ongoing. * WHERE...Fort Collins. * WHEN...Until 7 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and a few power outages may result. Strong winds will likely lead to rapid fire growth of any new fire.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County
